rows.label: qst500601_msg0001
rows.name: You're...Linne, right?

rows.label: qst500601_msg0002
rows.name: That is our name, yes.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0003
rows.name:
Sorry, it's just... That Core Crystal
was displayed in our shop for ages,
so seeing it finally come to life...

rows.label: qst500601_msg0004
rows.name:
It's still kind of surreal, you know?
Oh, I'm loving the whole always-in-the-
bath thing, by the way. Very hygienic.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0005
rows.name: Are you making fun of us, peon?

rows.label: qst500601_msg0006
rows.name: N-not at all!

rows.label: qst500601_msg0007
rows.name:
So pray tell, did you want
something of us?

rows.label: qst500601_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh yeah, right.
My grandpa made a promise with you
when he was younger, you see.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0009
rows.name: A promise, you say?

rows.label: qst500601_msg0010
rows.name:
He said that if he managed to sell your
Core Crystal for half a million G, he'd
give half the proceeds back to you.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0011
rows.name:
Does this mean 250 thousand G
is ours for the taking?

rows.label: qst500601_msg0012
rows.name:
That's the long and short of it,
ridiculous though it may be...

rows.label: qst500601_msg0013
rows.name:
Truly, our former self was a genius!
A queen among queens!

rows.label: qst500601_msg0014
rows.name:
My grandpa was always grumbling
about that promise, though. Said a rock
like this would never sell for that price.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0015
rows.name:
And he had a point.
I mean, two generations later and
the thing was STILL on display.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0016
rows.name:
But a buyer appeared in the end,
did they not? And now you are
250 thousand G the richer!

rows.label: qst500601_msg0017
rows.name:
Perhaps you should have priced
it at five million G instead.

rows.label: qst500601_msg0018
rows.name:
Doubtless our Driver would have paid
up regardless of the asking price!

rows.label: qst500601_msg0019
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: qst500601_msg0020
rows.name:
...This is quite the Blade you've
got your hands on.
